Klotski 1.0 API

Packages
Package
Description
core
Defines the foundational classes of the project
core.listener
Defines interfaces for receiving various events throughout the project
io
Defines classes that can interact with data outside the project
io.db
Defines the classes needed to interact with the database
io.db.codecs
Provides adapters to exchange data with the database
io.schemas
Define classes to represent objects inside the database
main
Provides the java entry point as long as some project-wide constants
solver
Defines the classes for solving the Klotski game
ui
Provides all the classes for creating the user interface
ui.blocks
Defines the classes that represent blocks in the Klotski game and their graphics
ui.dialogs
Provides classes that generate dialogs to interact with the user
